domain_description: You will be asked to listen to 20 short, 15-second audio clips of a song, and select the artist/band who interpreted each song.

task 01.description: listen to the audio clip and select the artist/band who interpreted the song
task 01.possible_answers: "avicii, jason derulo, charli xcx, tove lo, calvin harris"

task 02.possible_answers: "lady antebellum, charli xcx, imagine dragons, drake, sam smith, beyonce"
